body.para:
What is the current status of the registry needed for ISSUE-27 (rel-ownership
[1]) resolution?
body.footer: Paul Cotton, Microsoft Canada 17 Eleanor Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2E 6A3 Tel: (425) 705-9596 Fax: (425) 936-7329

quote.quotepara:
-----Original Message----- From: public-html-request@w3.org [mailto:public-html-request@w3.org] On Behalf
Of Julian Reschke Sent: Saturday, April 03, 2010 4:24 PM To: Maciej Stachowiak Cc: Mark Nottingham; public-html@w3.org WG Subject: Re: I-D Action:draft-nottingham-http-link-header-09.txt
Thanks for letting us know. Is the registry set up yet? Do you know if it will be soon? ...
The registry won't be set up until IESG approval; which hasn't happened yet (mainly because of the Area Director change and the IETF meeting in Anaheim).
